Reviews.Title: “Superb service, comfortable rooms, decent price”

Reviews.Content: wife stayed separate nights resort hotel stayed didnt 4night stay assumed typical european hotel pleasantly surprised especially paris hotel mistake youre chain hotels etc wont found cozy modern apparently recently renovated beds comfy bathrooms functional modern hotel 5 6 floors elevator walkup service personnel excellent communicate easily english spanish words french help smiles suggestions attitude denies french rudeness stereotypes breakfast buffet layed typical fare eggs bacon sausage appetite breakfast honor bar afternoonevening serve yourself consumed checkout 101 perfect european hotel chain hotel layouts 202 bit awkward comfortable paid 220 euronight breakfast included midsept 2011 worth 2 nights stay concorde lafayette half block hotel adjacent convention center horrible comparison surely visit
